page.title: 16Bridport Arts Centre.
page.content: Bridport Arts Society was formed in 1968 to bring theatre to Bridport. The Arts Centre is in a former Methodist Chapel bought in 1972. It is gradually being converted from a mass of buildings into a single complex. First to be completed was the main hall with a stage and dressing room where visiting theatre companies as well as enthusiastic amateur groups perform plays. Bridport Film Society also meets here. Concerts, talks and craft markets occur regularly. There is now a new Clubroom where members can meet for coffee and which other groups can hire for various functions. The Allsop Room (named after the first president, Kenneth Allsop) is a large bright Exhibition room.
